column1: # DESCRIPTION: Promote residential customers from Orion tables to DataStore

column3: WHEN '1' THEN 'Landline' WHEN '2' THEN 'Mobile' ELSE 'Unknown' END AS nchar(8))
WHEN '1' THEN 'Landline' WHEN '2' THEN 'Mobile' ELSE 'Unknown' END AS nchar(8))

,1) = '4' THEN CONCAT(crm_party.std_code, crm_party.phone_no) WHEN LEFT(crm_party.secondary_std_code,1) = '4' THEN CONCAT(crm_party.secondary_std_code, crm_party.secondary_phone_no) ELSE 'Unknown' END AS nchar(10))
WHEN '9' THEN 'Residential' WHEN '8' THEN 'Business' ELSE 'Unknown' END AS nchar(11))

column2: FROM lumo.crm_party, lumo.nc_client, lumo.crm_element_hierarchy WHERE nc_client.seq_party_id = crm_party.seq_party_id AND crm_element_hierarchy.element_id = crm_party.seq_party_id AND crm_element_hierarchy.seq_element_type_id = '9'
